content: *i am fascinated by spirals especially spirals occurring in nature it s something mesmerising about them spiral is one of the oldest symbols representing creativity energy growth etc it is a shape used for centuries so it s not surprising that i was inspired by ferns for this pattern * *this pillow is made using **overlay mosaic crochet technique** for the front panel and traditional crochet for the back panels it contains a digital chart **full written instructions** mosaic crochet explanation advice on how to read the chart photos written pattern for the back panels and assembly instructions * *the actual digital chart is 75 stitches by 77 row = pillow size 40 x 40cm * *each chart can be used to make the pillow wall hanging a bag anything you like…your creativity has no boundaries and i would love to see what you make * *you will need two contrasting colours to make this pattern i have used dk / 8 ply yarn 150g of black yarn 60g of green yarn 100g = approx 280m* *this pattern has been designed by me sarka baran - sharka s magic crochet and is protected by international copyright law please do not copy share display or redistribute this pattern without the owner s permission this includes sharing photos of parts of the charts with others * *you are more than welcome to sell your finished items using this pattern/charts but i would appreciate if you could give me credit for the pattern if possible if you would like to contact me you can message me through ravelry or facebook *
